languages.text: Deals toxic damage. On failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}.

languages.text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Наносит {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутой{/g} и получает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (6).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を与える。対象は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}し、さらに{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}(6)を受ける。
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

languages.text: Verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt {/g} und mit {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (6) belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt {/g} und mit {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (6) belegt zu werden.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Toksik hasar{/g} verir. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} (6) etkilerine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Toksik hasar{/g} verir. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} (6) etkilerine maruz kalır.

languages.text: Inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (6).

languages.text: Inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o será {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y sufrirá {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6).
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: Inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o será {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y sufrirá {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (6).

languages.text: 造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6）。
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (6).

traits.locale_text: 造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（6）。
